name: Frying Pan
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="panMetalGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(10,10,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="panHandleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,82,45);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,41,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="256" rx="150" ry="30" fill="url(#panMetalGrad)" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="350" y="246" width="120" height="20" fill="url(#panHandleGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Cooking Pot (Stockpot)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="potMetalGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,180);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,130);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="150" width="212" height="200" fill="url(#potMetalGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="130" y="180" width="20" height="40" fill="url(#potMetalGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <rect x="362" y="180" width="20" height="40" fill="url(#potMetalGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="150" rx="106" ry="10" fill="url(#potMetalGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Wooden Spoon
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="spoonWoodGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="246" y="100" width="20" height="300" fill="url(#spoonWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="3" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="420" rx="30" ry="50" fill="url(#spoonWoodGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Dinner Plate
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="plateGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="300" rx="150" ry="30" fill="url(#plateGrad)" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="300" rx="140" ry="20" fill="url(#plateGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Coffee Mug
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="mugGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="200" width="150" height="200" fill="url(#mugGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#9C5C5C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 300 250 A 50 50 0 1 0 300 350" fill="url(#mugGrad)" stroke="#9C5C5C" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>

name: Fork
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="forkMetalGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,180);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,130);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="246" y="100" width="20" height="350" fill="url(#forkMetalGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="3" />
  <rect x="246" y="100" width="5" height="50" fill="url(#forkMetalGrad)" />
  <rect x="261" y="100" width="5" height="50" fill="url(#forkMetalGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Knife (Butter)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="knifeHandleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,82,45);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,41,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="knifeBladeGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,180);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,130);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="246" y="250" width="20" height="200" fill="url(#knifeHandleGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="3" />
  <path d="M 246 250 L 266 250 L 276 100 L 236 100 Z" fill="url(#knifeBladeGrad)" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Spoon
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="spoonMetalGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,180);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,130);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="246" y="150" width="20" height="300" fill="url(#spoonMetalGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="3" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="150" rx="25" ry="50" fill="url(#spoonMetalGrad)" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Blender
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="blenderBaseGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="blenderJarGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,220,255);stop-opacity:0.8" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,180,220);stop-opacity:0.8" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="200" y="300" width="112" height="100" fill="url(#blenderBaseGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="220" y="150" width="72" height="150" fill="url(#blenderJarGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>

name: Whisk
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="whiskHandleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="whiskWireGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,180);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,130);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="246" y="200" width="20" height="150" fill="url(#whiskHandleGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="3" />
  <path d="M 256 350 C 200 450, 312 450, 256 350 Z" stroke="url(#whiskWireGrad)" stroke-width="5" fill="none" />
</svg>

name: Rolling Pin
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="pinWoodGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(220,180,140);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,140,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="230" width="312" height="50" fill="url(#pinWoodGrad)" rx="25" ry="25" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="80" y="200" width="20" height="110" fill="url(#pinWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="3" />
  <rect x="412" y="200" width="20" height="110" fill="url(#pinWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Cereal Bowl
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="bowlGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 400 L 362 400 L 330 300 L 182 300 Z" fill="url(#bowlGrad)" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="300" rx="100" ry="20" fill="url(#bowlGrad)" />
  <path d="M 182 300 Q 256 250, 330 300" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.6" />
</svg>
